pull_request.title: heaver pose filter and merging default.

pullrequest.title: heaver pose filter and merging default.

content.raw:
Unfortunately we haven't had time to give GzWeb some love and reviews in a while.

This repository is being migrated to GitHub, so I've pulled this branch into the `osrf` repository for it to be migrated together with the rest of the code. Feel free to reopen the PR on GitHub.
content.html:
Unfortunately we haven't had time to give GzWeb some love and reviews in a while.

This repository is being migrated to GitHub, so I've pulled this branch into the osrf repository for it to be migrated together with the rest of the code. Feel free to reopen the PR on GitHub.

pull_request.title: heaver pose filter and merging default.

pullrequest.title: heaver pose filter and merging default.

content.raw: Still not being as fast as original ```gzbridge``` , but making the filer a little heavier boosted it up a bit.
content.html: Still not being as fast as original gzbridge , but making the filer a little heavier boosted it up a bit.

update.description:
* created branch gzweb_1.3.0, which is compatible with gazebo7

* Backed out changeset ad74f8525ce3

* Backout a1a872f

* Backout 71e8256

* added models to the insert tab

* fix roads

* Close branch more_hardcoded_models

* Close branch fix_roads

* backport fix

* replace space char

* update gz3d.js

* fix light stats update

* Close branch id_space_1.3

* Close branch fix_roads_1.3

* Solved error "Cannot read property 'self_collide' of undefined" when you tri to push some textures to floor

* Added same changes than are in gz3d.js

* minor updates to readme

* Added optional 'port' argument

* Updated README for start_gzweb port arg

* Using getopts for port arg

* Correct 'port' argument in README

* compiles with node v6

* fuctions can work without isolate

* fixed style errors

* fixed line 268 error

* update coding style, unboost

* this

* throttle gui pose updates

* style

* remove unused function

* typo

* Close branch style_update

* fix mouse panning

* Close branch fix_pan

* Close branch gui_pose_update

* wip: update to three js rev86. Fixed sprites in radialmenu, joint visuals, bounding box, transform control, ray projection, material ambient. Updated collada loader and tweaked texture loading.

* update collada loader to use normal map by default if bumptype not specified

* port submesh fixes and fix submesh loading in sdfparser

* remove unused code, fixed mobile gzmanipulator trans material

* replaced itTouchDevice logic by checking if it is a mobile device

* Updated running instructions to ensure that port 7681 is usable.

* open both ports

* removed redundant instruction

* removing a blank line

* removed unneeded line

* kill http and ws servers

* remove -9

* Close branch stop_gzweb

* jasmine tests for sdf parser using karma task runner

* removed event emitter from the test because of the statusUpdate error

* removed un needed intializations

* added more comprehensive  tests

* added more comprehensive tests

* Markdown README

* Close branch markdown_readme

* removed trailing white spaces

* moved tests, updates running tests

* renamed test file to be consistent

* using local karma instead of the global one

* fix multi-material / material array view as

* remove comments

* removed more commentted out blockes

* Link to tutorials on README instead of duplicating information

* fix spot and directional light target / direction

* update light shadow apis

* fix missing material

* Close branch readme_links_tuts

* isTouchDevice checks for mobiles.

* fix semi transparent simple shapes

* fix sdfparser material missing uri

* fix spdf parser pose test

* fix spawn pose, null point

* added karma coverage test

* coverage test set to default dir

* replaced getScalefromMatrix by getScaleFromMatrix

* fix center submesh

* Close branch threejs_r86

* replaced updateGZ3D script by npm update script

* added npm run update

* replaced start script by npm run start

* removed start_gzweb.sh and stop_gzweb.sh scripts

* npm run deploy script added

* now we can use --port option

* check joints and links existence in setModelStats

* added npm run docs

* merge default

* fixed a typo in packge json

* updategz3d deletion mistake fixed

* fixed updategz3d history

* run update script

* cleaning

* added jsdoc to utils

* cleaning wrong commit

* cleaning

* firefox time leak fix

* touch screens are not mobile

* merged in default

* heaver bose filter

* fixed start script and modified pose filter

* cleaning gzbridge

* Initial Bitbucket Pipelines configuration

* removed un tracked files

* removed start and stop scripts
update.title: Materials gzbridge

pull_request.title: heaver pose filter and merging default.
